Name: Urban Legend: The Tale Teller
Description: The one who tells urban legends has mysteriously disappeared. Perhaps those who gaze long into anomalies find the anomalies gazing back, and may one day be devoured by them, becoming part of the anomaly itself... And you, tugging at the loose threads, begin to sense the secret behind it all...
QuestDesc: The one who tells urban legends has mysteriously disappeared. Perhaps those who gaze long into anomalies find the anomalies gazing back, and may one day be devoured by them, becoming part of the anomaly itself... And you, tugging at the loose threads, begin to sense the secret behind it all...

Dialogues.Speaker: Trembling Student
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Caselli's missing… Madam President sent people to look for her, but her dorm mates, her teachers... No one's seen her.

Dialogues.Speaker: Trembling Student
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's like she just… vanished into thin air.

Dialogues.Speaker: Flustered Student
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That's why we don't say that name. It never likes being called.

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Student
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The less we know, the safer.

Dialogues.Speaker: Serious Student
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: There's a layer between the Academy's public face and what's hidden beneath. Outsiders stay outside. Only those who get an "answer" learn what's underneath.

Dialogues.Speaker: Flustered Student
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let's just stop. I feel sick… I don't want to talk about this anymore.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: (Hm? Is there something over there...? I'll check.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Near the flowerbed, a damaged tablet lies half-buried in grass. Its cracked screen looks like it got clawed badly by something.

Options.PlotLineKey: (It's not locked. A recording begins to play automatically.)

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: For a long while, there's nothing but meaningless static. Just as you consider stopping it, a voice cuts through the noise.

Dialogues.Speaker: Recording from an Unknown Source
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...This is it? This is the big taboo? Who would even believe this...

Dialogues.Speaker: Recording from an Unknown Source
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Cut it out! No... that's impossible... You can't be real…

Dialogues.Speaker: Recording from an Unknown Source
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Stay away! STAY AWAY FROM ME!

Dialogues.Speaker: Recording from an Unknown Source
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...The Dark Side… is ▇▇… but the most terrifying thing… isn't the paranormal... It's… the human heart…

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The recording cuts out. In the last second, it seems as if something brushes against the microphone.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sometimes, silence is more terrifying than a scream.
